entity.name: coolLabs Solutions
entity.description: Coolify is an open-source & self-hostable alternative to Heroku / Netlify / Vercel. It helps you manage your servers, applications, and databases on your own hardware with just an SSH connection. We are a self-funded company that depends on community support to sustain the project and keep it completely free and open-source with no features behind a paywall.

projects.name: Coolify
projects.description: An open-source & self-hostable alternative to Heroku / Netlify / Vercel. Manage your servers, applications, and databases on your own hardware.

channels.description: Support us through GitHub Sponsors with credit/debit card or PayPal.
Support us through Open Collective with various payment methods.

plans.name: Supporter
plans.description: Thank you very much! Every penny means the world to us. Includes Public Sponsor achievement on profile.

plans.name: Supporter Plus
plans.description: Wow! That's 5 times the previous tier. Includes Public Sponsor achievement on profile.

plans.name: Bronze Sponsor
plans.description: You almost covered all the current hosting expenses alone! Includes Public Sponsor achievement on profile.

plans.name: Silver Sponsor
plans.description: You covered all the hosting expenses! Includes Public Sponsor achievement on profile.

plans.name: Small Sponsor
plans.description: Things are getting serious! Small logo displayed on GitHub README (~30k monthly visitors) and landing page (~50-70k monthly visitors).

plans.name: Large Sponsor
plans.description: Huge logo in dedicated sponsor section on GitHub README (~30k monthly visitors), landing page (~50-70k monthly visitors), documentation (~50-70k monthly visitors), and exclusive Discord channel (13k+ members).

plans.name: One-time Donation
plans.description: Make a one-time contribution to support Coolify's development.
